title: Awareness Program on Women’s Rights and Legal Protection
description:
Awareness Drive on AICTE Pragathi Scholarship
The program was conducted to create awareness among Telangana diploma girl students about
government-supported financial assistance for higher education. The session provided clear
guidance on eligibility, benefits, and the application process through the National Scholarship
Portal (NSP), including a live demonstration. An interactive discussion helped students clarify
doubts, reduce application errors, and gain confidence in applying independently.

title: Essay Writing Competition – Vignana Darshini
description:
This was conducted as part of the Vignana Darshini – Scientific Telangana initiative to promote
scientific temper and analytical writing among students. The competition was organized at
Government Institute of Electronics (GIOE) and Government Polytechnic for Women (GPW),
enabling participation from both institutions. The theme focused on science in daily life, and

selected entries were forwarded for evaluation at the Greater Hyderabad level, providing
students with wider academic exposure.
location: Government Institute of Electronics (GIOE) and Government Polytechnic for Women (GPW)

title: Career Guidance & Entrepreneurship Program
description:
The FEEDX Polytechnic Community will soon be organizing a Career Guidance &
Entrepreneurship Program for final-year diploma students at Vigyan Vedika, GIOE
Auditorium.
The program will feature industry experts and focus on career opportunities after diploma,
entrepreneurship guidance, industry insights, and interactive discussions. Further details
regarding the schedule and participation will be shared shortly.
